channel.title: Dls on Bao's essays
channel.description: Recent content in Dls on Bao's essays

item.title: Lesson 2
item.description: 2 sets of books. fastbooks to learn. the other for experiment dog cat dataset tags contain dog and cat breeds create category: classification regression: predict one or more numeric quantities? different applications diagnosing viruses terminology mostly in the book valid_pct: take a portion of the training dataset and put it asidefor testing purpose avoid overfitting cnn_learner(,(resnet34: resnet architecture, 34 layers, good for image recognition), metrics=error_rate, epoch: what we call when we look at every single image once?

item.title: Lesson 1
item.description: didactic approach deep learning is a type of neural network. top down approach: see the big picture first. will get more technical at time goes by. software fastai. pytorch: not designed for beginner’s friendliness. a layered api 1 literally overloaded methods free factoring and jupyter server: backbone of my code everytime i run something it updates the server’s state questionnaires at the end read first: do all of them before moving to the next chapter first notebook error rate of 0.
